__TOC__

=== What ===
IRC Meetings for the Ubuntu Women's Group to discuss upcoming activities.

=== Who ===
Anyone interested in promoting Women's involvement in the Ubuntu Community 

=== Where ===
IRC Channel on <nowiki>[[http://freenode.net/irc_servers.shtml|freenode]]</nowiki> - #ubuntu-women 

=== What and When ===
Check out <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Events|wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Events]]</nowiki> for dates and times of our current meetings and topics to be discussed!
 
=== Resources ===

Previous meeting logs:  <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings]]</nowiki>

<nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Courses/IRC/|Lyz's IRC Tutorial]]</nowiki> covers <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Courses/IRC/XChatHowTo|use of the Graphical IRC client X-Chat]]</nowiki> (very popular) and <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Courses/IRC/IrssiHowTo|the text-based client irssi]]</nowiki>.
